Reviews.Title: “Hotel doesn't offer refunds ... even during strike with no way to get there”
Reviews.Author: cruiserfromnj
Reviews.Content: planned staying acta european cruise unfortunately day flew strikes europe fly barcelona fly paris train barcelona left trains paris transportation spain strike hotel acta acknowledged aware care refund money top booked name night im cost weeks return cancelled reservation found holiday inn stay barcelona close reading reviews unsafe conditions hotel im glad didnt stay knowing strikes prevented getting trying cancel day advance hotel charged
